description:
Devoted to helping you face your legal challenges head-on and improving the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you deserve, the attorneys at Grimes Teich Anderson provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Cherokee County and the surrounding areas who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Personal injury and wrongful death
• Workers' compensation
• Social Security Disability
• Veterans benefits
• Employment law

For more than 40 years now, our law firm has protected the rights and entitlements of clients across our region, and we have grown to include eight total offices across North Carolina and South Carolina. This expansion lends credence to the level of success we have achieved advocating on behalf of those in need. What's more, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

As further evidence of our success, our attorneys have received AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell and Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from the National Trial Lawyers along with consistent recognition from Best Lawyers. Moreover, we have also received Superb client ratings Avvo as well as many testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

Our attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience, and we have on our staff attorneys who are board certified as workers' compensation specialists. To begin the process of receiving this high level of personalized attention and support for your matter, you can contact Grimes Teich Anderson to take advantage of our free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies.
